Package com.btp.serverData.repos

Class RecipeRepo

java.lang.Object
com.btp.serverData.repos.RecipeRepo
public class RecipeRepo
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the main repository for recipes

      this method is used to remove a recipe from the recipeRepo
      Parameters:
      id - int id of the recipe that wants to be removed

    • getRecipe

      Gets a recipe from the RecipeRepo using its id
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the Recipe of that specific id

    • searchByName

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> searchByName​(java.lang.String data)
      This method is used to search the recipe in the tree using the name
      Parameters:
      data - String value of the search
      Returns:
      a recipe if it finds one, or null if the search yields no results

      Throws:

      this method is used to check if an id has already been used
      Parameters:
      id - int id to check
      Returns:
      boolean value, depending on the id exists or not

      Returns:
      recommendations based on search

      This method is used to return the 5 recipes with the highest rating
      Returns:

      Returns:
